title: 이달의소녀탐구 #473 (LOONA TV #473)
summary:
0:01 -- It's Olivia Hye's turn to shoot her part. But it's raining outside (oof! HaSeul).
0:18 -- They start shooting indoors first. The two start contemplating why there are so many stairs in the LOOΠΔVERSE.
0:25 -- It is a pun Korean. 'Orrery Nim' did a great job at explaining this in the comments so I'll quote them here.
"the pun explained, for non-korean-speakers:It's based on the start of her name (oli), which sounds similar enough to "going up" or "raising up" (remember don't-RAISE-IT-or-lower-it-olivia-colombia-hye), so while they were talking about going up stairs all the time, she strikes, telling her... That's why she's oli-via hye"
0:31 -- Hyejoo starts climbing the stairs for her shoot. Go Won: "Hwaiting~" and she wishes her well.
0:45 -- Hyejoo says that she likes to shoot on the stairs like this. Go Won: "Go up a step!" (bruh Go Won lowkey savage!)
0:54 -- She was referring to them standing on the staircase while shooting this part of the LOOΠΔ TV.
